name: Wei-Lin Cheng
bio: Father, husband, and software engineer. Let's connect and grow together!

milestones.title: Crossing the Threshold: Contributing to Open Source for the First Time
milestones.description: Even if it's just a small enhancement, being able to contribute to the vibrant and diverse EddieHub Community is an important milestone in my journey as a developer.

milestones.title: Become a Software Engineer
milestones.description: As a software engineer responsible for backend development, I joined a cybersecurity company.
